name: HSP_ADMIT_PROC
description: The HSP_ADMIT_PROC table contains information on admission procedures. This table is based on PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the admission procedure for this patient.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The coded admission procedure for the patient.

columns.name: ADMIT_PROC_TEXT
columns.description: Free text admission procedure for the patient.

columns.name: ADMIT_PROC_DATE
columns.description: The date that the admission procedure is scheduled for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: ADM_PXDX_ASSOC
columns.description: Used for ABN checks.  A comma delimited list of  line numbers that associate this procedure to a diagnosis.

columns.name: ADM_PX2ABN_LINK
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of line numbers that indicate which ABN's are associated with this procedure.
